description: Canonical test registry for the MAT (Manual Audit Tool) module. Each test component has a unique serial number traceable to architecture, FRS, and TRS artifacts. All tests are initially RED (failing, implementation not yet built).

aimc_range.wave_7: MAT-T-AIMC-001 to MAT-T-AIMC-010 (blocks of 10 reserved per wave)
aimc_range.note: Gaps within each block are intentionally reserved for future tests per wave delivery

categories.name: Audit Lifecycle
categories.description: Tests covering audit creation, status transitions, deletion, and archival

categories.name: Criteria Management
categories.description: Tests covering criteria upload, AI parsing, approval, and numbering

categories.name: Evidence Collection
categories.description: Tests covering evidence upload, integrity hashing, and retrieval

categories.name: AI Services
categories.description: Tests covering AI scoring, transcription, report generation, and fallback

categories.name: Security and RLS
categories.description: Tests covering authentication, MFA, RLS policies, encryption, and audit trail

categories.name: Offline and Sync
categories.description: Tests covering offline capture, sync queue, conflict resolution, and PWA

categories.name: Watchdog and Observability
categories.description: Tests covering watchdog metrics, alert thresholds, and feedback loops

categories.name: Performance
categories.description: Tests covering load times, API response, AI processing, and scalability

categories.name: Integration
categories.description: Tests covering PIT export, Maturity Roadmap export, and Supabase wiring

categories.name: UI and Accessibility
categories.description: Tests covering responsive design, WCAG compliance, i18n, and component rendering

categories.name: Wiring Invariants
categories.description: Tests covering architecture-defined wiring invariants and connection registry compliance

categories.name: Data Privacy and Compliance
categories.description: Tests covering GDPR, POPIA, data retention, and regulatory alignment

categories.name: UI Wiring and Data Fetching Behavior
categories.description: E2E tests covering complete user workflows: UI interaction → data fetching → state management → display updates. Addresses Deviation #11 (frontend non-functional).

categories.name: AIMC Gateway Integration
categories.description: Tests verifying MAT AI capabilities are consumed via @maturion/ai-centre Gateway — no direct provider calls (per AIMC_STRATEGY.md v1.0.0)

components.name: Audit Creation
components.description: Verify Lead Auditor can create an audit with all mandatory fields and a unique ID is generated

components.name: Audit Status Lifecycle
components.description: Verify audit status transitions follow defined order; skipping states is rejected

components.name: Audit Soft Deletion and Archival
components.description: Verify audits are never physically deleted; archived audits remain read-only

components.name: Criteria Document Upload
components.description: Verify criteria document upload accepts PDF/DOCX within size limits and stores in Supabase Storage

components.name: AI Criteria Parsing
components.description: Verify AI parsing pipeline extracts structured criteria from uploaded documents

components.name: No-Hallucination Rule
components.description: Verify every AI-extracted criterion has a source anchor; no hallucinated criteria

components.name: Coverage Rule
components.description: Verify all source document blocks are mapped or marked as non-criteria

components.name: Human Approval of Parsed Criteria
components.description: Verify parsed criteria require explicit human approval before becoming active

components.name: Criteria Numbering Immutability
components.description: Verify criteria numbers are immutable after approval; DB constraints prevent modification

components.name: Hierarchical Navigation
components.description: Verify 3-level drill-down navigation: Dashboard → Domain → MPS → Criterion

components.name: Criteria Modal Component
components.description: Verify criteria modal opens in < 500ms and displays all tabs (evidence, score, notes)

components.name: Not Used Exclusion
components.description: Verify criteria can be marked 'Not Used' and excluded from scoring calculations

components.name: Evidence Collection — Text and Document
components.description: Verify evidence collection for text notes and document uploads with SHA-256 hashing

components.name: Evidence Collection — Voice Recording
components.description: Verify voice evidence capture via MediaRecorder API with transcription pipeline

components.name: Evidence Collection — Photo Capture
components.description: Verify photo evidence capture with camera API, SHA-256 hashing, and image analysis

components.name: Evidence Collection — Video
components.description: Verify video evidence upload with snapshot extraction and transcription

components.name: Concurrent File Uploads
components.description: Verify 10+ concurrent file uploads per user without conflicts

components.name: Evidence Integrity Verification
components.description: Verify SHA-256 hash computed at upload matches hash on retrieval; mismatch triggers alert

components.name: Evidence Review and Status
components.description: Verify evidence items can be reviewed with status transitions and notes

components.name: Criterion Interview Recording
components.description: Verify per-criterion interview recording, transcription, and linking as evidence

components.name: Audit-Level Interview
components.description: Verify audit-level interview recording spanning multiple criteria

components.name: Interview Governance
components.description: Verify interview records are immutable and governed under the audit trail

components.name: AI Maturity Scoring
components.description: Verify AI scoring pipeline returns maturity level (1-5), confidence score, and rationale

components.name: Evidence-First Scoring Rule
components.description: Verify AI scoring requires minimum evidence before proceeding

components.name: Human Score Confirmation
components.description: Verify AI scores require explicit human confirmation; no auto-commit

components.name: Override Logging
components.description: Verify AI score overrides are logged with structured reason codes

components.name: Maturity Model (5-Level)
components.description: Verify 5-level maturity model is correctly configured and applied in scoring

components.name: AI Task Routing
components.description: Verify AI Gateway routes requests to correct service containers
components.governance_note: SUPERSEDED — Direct AI provider pattern is constitutionally prohibited per AIMC_STRATEGY.md v1.0.0. This test validates the legacy direct-provider implementation. It must be refactored to validate AIMC Gateway integration when the upstream AIMC wave is delivered. See modules/mat/02-architecture/ai-architecture.md v2.0.0 and BUILD_PROGRESS_TRACKER.md DEV-MAT-AIMC-001.

components.name: AI Invocation Logging
components.description: Verify every AI API call is logged with input summary, model, tokens, and response status

components.name: AI Confidence Flagging
components.description: Verify low-confidence AI results are flagged for human review

components.name: AI Rate Limiting
components.description: Verify per-tenant and per-model rate limits are enforced at the AI Gateway
components.governance_note: SUPERSEDED — Direct AI provider pattern is constitutionally prohibited per AIMC_STRATEGY.md v1.0.0. This test validates the legacy direct-provider implementation. It must be refactored to validate AIMC Gateway integration when the upstream AIMC wave is delivered. See modules/mat/02-architecture/ai-architecture.md v2.0.0 and BUILD_PROGRESS_TRACKER.md DEV-MAT-AIMC-001.

components.name: AI Model Versioning
components.description: Verify AI model versions are tracked and logged per invocation
components.governance_note: SUPERSEDED — Direct AI provider pattern is constitutionally prohibited per AIMC_STRATEGY.md v1.0.0. This test validates the legacy direct-provider implementation. It must be refactored to validate AIMC Gateway integration when the upstream AIMC wave is delivered. See modules/mat/02-architecture/ai-architecture.md v2.0.0 and BUILD_PROGRESS_TRACKER.md DEV-MAT-AIMC-001.

components.name: Review Table Component
components.description: Verify pre-report review table displays all criteria with scores and evidence summaries

components.name: Review Table Editing
components.description: Verify inline editing of scores and notes in review table

components.name: Report Generation
components.description: Verify report generation via AI produces structured output in requested format

components.name: Report Formats (DOCX/PDF/JSON)
components.description: Verify report export in DOCX, PDF, and JSON formats

components.name: Excel Export
components.description: Verify Excel export produces formatted .xlsx with summary, criteria, scores, and evidence log

components.name: Report Approval
components.description: Verify report approval workflow with Lead Auditor sign-off

components.name: Global Dashboard
components.description: Verify global dashboard renders with correct aggregate metrics in < 3 seconds

components.name: Domain Dashboard
components.description: Verify domain-level dashboard drill-down with filtered metrics

components.name: MPS Dashboard
components.description: Verify MPS-level dashboard with criteria status breakdown

components.name: Maturity Distribution Visualization
components.description: Verify maturity distribution charts render correctly for all score ranges

components.name: RBAC Enforcement
components.description: Verify role-based access control for Lead Auditor, Auditor, Domain Auditor, Observer, Admin

components.name: Permission Inheritance
components.description: Verify permission inheritance from organisation → audit → domain → criterion level

components.name: Auditor Assignment Flow
components.description: Verify Lead Auditor can assign auditors to specific domains/criteria

components.name: Approval Authority
components.description: Verify approval authority restrictions — only Lead Auditors can approve/finalise

components.name: Offline Evidence Capture
components.description: Verify evidence capture works without network; data stored in IndexedDB/OPFS

components.name: Auto Sync on Reconnect
components.description: Verify sync queue processes in FIFO order on reconnect; SHA-256 verified; conflicts handled

components.name: Authentication Flow
components.description: Verify login with email/password, JWT issuance, and session management

components.name: MFA Enforcement
components.description: Verify MFA (TOTP) is required for Lead Auditor role; login blocked without MFA

components.name: Row-Level Security Policies
components.description: Verify RLS policies enforce organisation isolation — user A cannot access org B data

components.name: Audit Trail Immutability
components.description: Verify audit trail is append-only with hash chain; no UPDATE or DELETE allowed

components.name: Data Encryption (At Rest and In Transit)
components.description: Verify TLS 1.3+ for all connections and AES-256 encryption at rest

components.name: Criterion Status Tracking
components.description: Verify criterion-level status transitions are enforced and logged

components.name: Extensibility and Plugin Architecture
components.description: Verify modular architecture supports future AI model and service extensions

components.name: PIT Module Integration Export
components.description: Verify REST export endpoint for PIT module returns correct schema with RLS enforcement

components.name: Maturity Roadmap Integration Export
components.description: Verify REST export endpoint for Maturity Roadmap returns correct schema with RLS enforcement

components.name: Watchdog Monitoring Metrics
components.description: Verify real-time tracking of AI refusal rate, override rate, sync failures, suspicious access, performance

components.name: Watchdog Alert Thresholds
components.description: Verify configurable alert thresholds trigger notifications when exceeded

components.name: Override Analysis and Feedback Loop
components.description: Verify override reasons captured with structured categories and anonymized data pipeline

components.name: Responsive Design — Desktop
components.description: Verify full audit interface renders correctly at ≥1024px with side navigation

components.name: Responsive Design — Tablet
components.description: Verify collapsible navigation and single-column layout at 768px–1023px

components.name: Responsive Design — Mobile
components.description: Verify stacked layout and touch-optimized controls at <768px with 44x44px targets

components.name: PWA Support
components.description: Verify PWA installability, service worker registration, and offline capability

components.name: Accessibility (WCAG 2.1 AA)
components.description: Verify ARIA labels, keyboard nav, contrast ratios, and screen reader compatibility

components.name: Internationalization (i18n)
components.description: Verify English and Afrikaans support with locale-aware date/number formatting

components.name: GDPR Compliance — DSAR and Erasure
components.description: Verify Data Subject Access Request export and right-to-erasure anonymization

components.name: POPIA Compliance
components.description: Verify POPIA processing conditions, information officer config, and breach notification

components.name: Data Retention Policy Enforcement
components.description: Verify configurable retention policies with automated soft-delete expiry

components.name: Regulatory Standard Alignment
components.description: Verify ISO 27001 and ISO 19011 alignment evidence is exportable

components.name: Large Audit Compilation
components.description: Verify audit compilation of 1000+ criteria completes in < 5 minutes

components.name: Concurrent Auditor Support
components.description: Verify 100+ concurrent users with no degradation of page load times (<2s)

components.name: Page Load Performance (LCP < 2.5s)
components.description: Verify initial page load < 3s on 4G, SPA navigation < 500ms, LCP < 2.5s

components.name: API Response Time (< 200ms p95 CRUD)
components.description: Verify CRUD operations < 200ms p95, list queries < 500ms p95, dashboard < 1s p95

components.name: AI Processing Performance
components.description: Verify AI parsing < 60s, scoring < 30s, transcription < 2x realtime, report < 2min

components.name: AI Service Failure — Circuit Breaker
components.description: Verify circuit breaker opens after threshold failures; fallback model (GPT-4o Mini) activates
components.governance_note: SUPERSEDED — Direct AI provider pattern is constitutionally prohibited per AIMC_STRATEGY.md v1.0.0. This test validates the legacy direct-provider implementation. It must be refactored to validate AIMC Gateway integration when the upstream AIMC wave is delivered. See modules/mat/02-architecture/ai-architecture.md v2.0.0 and BUILD_PROGRESS_TRACKER.md DEV-MAT-AIMC-001.

components.name: AI Degraded Mode — Manual Scoring
components.description: Verify manual scoring mode activates when AI is unavailable (circuit breaker open)

components.name: Upload Failure and Retry
components.description: Verify file upload retry logic with automatic retries and user retry button

components.name: Wiring Invariant — No Orphan Components
components.description: Verify every component has at least one defined connection in the Connection Registry

components.name: Wiring Invariant — No Phantom Interfaces
components.description: Verify every exposed interface has a corresponding implemented wiring path

components.name: Wiring Invariant — No Implicit Connections
components.description: Verify all component communications are documented in the Connection Registry

components.name: Wiring Invariant — Directional Clarity
components.description: Verify every connection has defined producer, consumer, and data flow direction

components.name: Wiring Invariant — Failure Isolation
components.description: Verify every connection documents failure behavior per §3.11.3 cascade table

components.name: Connection [A] — Frontend to Supabase Auth
components.description: Verify HTTPS/JWT/MFA wiring between MAT Frontend and Supabase Auth

components.name: Connection [B] — Frontend to PostgREST + RLS
components.description: Verify HTTPS REST + RLS wiring between MAT Frontend and Supabase PostgREST

components.name: Connection [C] — Realtime WebSocket Subscriptions
components.description: Verify WebSocket subscription wiring for live dashboard updates

components.name: Connection [D] — Frontend to Supabase Storage
components.description: Verify signed-URL-based file upload/download wiring

components.name: Connection [E] — Frontend to Edge Functions
components.description: Verify HTTPS REST wiring between Frontend and Supabase Edge Functions

components.name: Connection [F] — Frontend to Service Worker
components.description: Verify fetch interception wiring between Frontend and Service Worker

components.name: Connection [G] — Edge Functions to AI Gateway
components.description: Verify internal HTTPS REST wiring between Edge Functions and AI Gateway

components.name: Connection [H] — AI Gateway to PostgREST
components.description: Verify AI Gateway reads evidence and stores results via service key

components.name: Connection [K] — AI Services to OpenAI API
components.description: Verify HTTPS REST wiring between AI Services and OpenAI API with API key auth

components.name: Connection [L] — Service Worker Sync to Supabase
components.description: Verify queued sync replay from Service Worker to Supabase on reconnect

components.name: Startup Order Compliance
components.description: Verify system startup follows defined order: PostgreSQL → Supabase → Edge Functions → AI Gateway → AI Services → Frontend → Service Worker

components.name: Input Validation and Sanitization
components.description: Verify server-side validation, SQL injection prevention, XSS prevention, and file upload validation

components.name: API Security Headers and CORS
components.description: Verify security headers (HSTS, CSP, X-Frame-Options) and CORS restricted to known origins

components.name: Consent Management
components.description: Verify explicit consent recording, withdrawal capability, and privacy-by-default settings

components.name: Dashboard Realtime Update Wiring
components.description: Verify Supabase Realtime broadcasts changes via WebSocket and dashboard re-renders without refresh

components.name: Dashboard fetches and displays real Supabase data
components.description: Verify dashboard loads with useQuery, fetches from audits table, displays metrics, shows loading skeleton, handles errors

components.name: Dashboard implements Realtime subscriptions for live updates
components.description: Verify dashboard subscribes to Realtime channel, listens for events, updates within 5 seconds, unsubscribes on unmount

components.name: Create Audit button displays form with validation
components.description: Verify button triggers modal with form, controlled inputs, Zod validation, disabled state while submitting

components.name: Create Audit form submits and saves to Supabase
components.description: Verify form uses useMutation, submits to POST /rest/v1/audits, shows toast, closes modal, updates list

components.name: Audit list fetches and displays audits from Supabase
components.description: Verify useQuery fetches audits with RLS filter, displays list with status badges, shows skeleton loader, empty state

components.name: Edit Audit functionality updates audit in Supabase
components.description: Verify edit button triggers pre-filled form, useMutation PATCH, optimistic UI update, toast notifications

components.name: Delete Audit (soft delete) functionality updates Supabase
components.description: Verify delete button triggers confirmation, useMutation soft delete, optimistic UI removal, undo option

components.name: Audit status transition UI updates status in Supabase
components.description: Verify status dropdown with useMutation, validates transitions, updates Supabase, color-coded badges

components.name: Audit search and filter functionality filters client-side or server-side
components.description: Verify search input with debounced handler, filter dropdowns, useQuery with params or client-side filtering

components.name: Criteria document upload UI accepts PDF/DOCX and uploads to Supabase Storage
components.description: Verify drag-and-drop, file validation, Storage upload with signed URL, progress bar, useMutation

components.name: Criteria tree displays hierarchical data from Supabase
components.description: Verify useQuery fetches criteria with parent_id, recursive tree rendering, expand/collapse state, loading skeleton

components.name: Criteria modal displays criterion details and linked evidence
components.description: Verify modal triggered by click, useQuery fetches criterion with evidence and scores, displays full text

components.name: AI parsing trigger button invokes edge function and updates Supabase
components.description: Verify button triggers useMutation for edge function, polling for job status, populates tree, progress indicator

components.name: Criteria search and filter functionality filters tree
components.description: Verify search input filters tree client-side, highlights matching text, auto-expands tree to show matches

components.name: Criteria keyboard navigation (arrow keys) works in tree
components.description: Verify tree supports arrow key navigation, up/down moves focus, right/left expands/collapses, focus indicators

components.name: Text note capture saves to Supabase
components.description: Verify textarea with controlled input, useMutation saves to evidence table, autosave, success toast

components.name: Photo capture uploads to Supabase Storage
components.description: Verify camera button triggers MediaDevices API, displays preview, uploads to Storage, creates evidence record

components.name: Audio recording uploads to Supabase Storage
components.description: Verify record button uses MediaRecorder API, displays timer, uploads audio blob to Storage

components.name: Video recording uploads to Supabase Storage
components.description: Verify video button uses MediaDevices API with video constraints, recording with MediaRecorder, uploads to Storage

components.name: Interview recording (structured audio with transcription) saves to Supabase
components.description: Verify interview form with metadata fields, audio recording, uploads to Storage, triggers AI transcription edge function

components.name: AI scoring trigger button invokes edge function
components.description: Verify button triggers useMutation for score-criterion edge function, polling for batch job status, updates UI

components.name: Human confirmation workflow (approve/reject AI scores) updates Supabase
components.description: Verify review table displays AI scores, approve button updates status to confirmed, edit button opens modal

components.name: Review table fetches and displays scoring data from Supabase
components.description: Verify useQuery fetches from scores table with joins, displays table with sort and filter, loading skeleton

components.name: Report generation button downloads PDF report
components.description: Verify button triggers useMutation for generate-report edge function, downloads PDF, displays progress

components.name: User profile management UI updates user_preferences table
components.description: Verify settings form with controlled inputs, useQuery fetches user data, useMutation updates user_profiles table

components.name: Organization settings UI updates organization_settings table
components.description: Verify settings form for org preferences, useQuery fetches org settings, useMutation updates table, RLS policies

components.name: All page components import and render child components with data props
components.description: Verify all page files import child components, pass data from useQuery as props, manage loading/error states

components.name: TanStack Query configured with Supabase client and proper cache settings
components.description: Verify QueryClientProvider wraps app, QueryClient configured, Supabase query functions created, cache invalidation

components.name: Loading states (skeleton loaders) and error states (toast notifications) implemented for all data-fetching components
components.description: Verify all data-fetching components render skeleton loaders while loading, toast errors, empty state messages

components.name: AIMC Advisory Gateway — Embedded AI Assistant Panel

components.description: Verify MAT source code contains no imports from AI provider SDKs (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.) — all AI calls go through @maturion/ai-centre

components.name: AIMC Advisory Gateway — AIMC Invocation Reference ID Captured

components.governance_note: This test is RED until @maturion/ai-centre exposes the Advisory Gateway. See AIMC_STRATEGY.md v1.0.0.

components.name: AIMC Analysis Gateway — Maturity Scoring via Gateway
components.description: Verify maturity scoring calls aimc.analysis.scoreMaturity() — no direct OpenAI/provider calls
components.governance_note: This test is RED until @maturion/ai-centre exposes the Analysis Gateway. See AIMC_STRATEGY.md v1.0.0.

components.name: AIMC Analysis Gateway — No Provider API Keys in MAT Configuration
components.description: Verify no AI provider API keys exist in any MAT .env file, Edge Function config, or frontend bundle after AIMC migration

components.name: AIMC Embeddings/RAG Gateway — Similarity Search via Gateway

coverage.frs_coverage: FR-001 through FR-072 (all 72 functional requirements covered)
coverage.trs_coverage: TR-001 through TR-072 (key technical requirements referenced)
coverage.ui_behavior_coverage: CAT-13 added: 29 E2E UI behavior tests for complete user workflows (addresses Deviation #11)
coverage.aimc_coverage: CAT-13 added: 9 AIMC Gateway integration tests (MAT-T-AIMC-001 through MAT-T-AIMC-021). All RED — blocked on AIMC Waves 3/4/5 per AIMC_STRATEGY.md v1.0.0. See BUILD_PROGRESS_TRACKER.md DEV-MAT-AIMC-001.

aimc_governance_note: AIMC_STRATEGY.md v1.0.0 is constitutional authority for all AI integration. Tests MAT-T-AIMC-* are RED until @maturion/ai-centre exposes the required Gateway capabilities. Serial number blocks are intentionally reserved per AIMC wave: Wave 7 (Advisory) = MAT-T-AIMC-001–010 (5 tests defined, 5 reserved); Wave 8 (Analysis) = MAT-T-AIMC-011–020 (3 tests defined, 7 reserved); Wave 9 (Embeddings/RAG) = MAT-T-AIMC-021–030 (1 test defined, 9 reserved). Gaps within each block are intentionally reserved for additional tests added when AIMC waves deliver. Tests MAT-T-0028, MAT-T-0031, MAT-T-0032, MAT-T-0076 validate legacy direct-provider patterns (now superseded) — see governance_note on each component. Issue #377 is superseded. See ai-architecture.md v2.0.0 for the AIMC Gateway pattern.
